# FARSPackage

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

FARSPackage is an example package made using functions provided by Coursera from the course Building R Packages. It reads and plots Fatality Analysis Reporting System (FARS) data.

## Installation

You can install the released version of FARSPackage from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("FARSPackage")
```
